song.title: Passion
song.info:
This song is the final piece to the 'Eyes' series, made as a short introduction to the album.
After more than two years, the album is complete, with this song being the last puzzle piece.
I don't really have much more to say about it apart from that it was meant to be similar to Memories so the two would constitute a kind of frame to the four 'big' songs.
It was done in a few evening hours on January 10 and 11, 2012, as a break from studying medieval and renaissance literature :)
